definition: A task or activity involving the organization, tidying up, and clearing of a space or area, typically performed after an event, situation, or occurrence that has caused disorder or chaos. It is commonly used to describe the process of cleaning up or restoring order after a disaster, accident, or any kind of mess.

examples.german: Die Aufräumarbeit nach dem Sturm dauerte mehrere Tage.
examples.english: The cleanup work after the storm took several days.

examples.german: Die Aufräumarbeit nach der Party war anstrengend.
examples.english: The cleanup work after the party was exhausting.

examples.german: Die Aufräumarbeit im Garten hat sich gelohnt.
examples.english: The cleanup work in the garden was worth it.

examples.german: Die Aufräumarbeit nach dem Unfall war schwierig.
examples.english: The cleanup work after the accident was difficult.

examples.german: Die Aufräumarbeit nach dem Brand war umfangreich.
examples.english: The cleanup work after the fire was extensive.
